item.title: ManageEngine ADManager Plus
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://pitstop.manageengine.com/portal/en/community/topic/log4j-ad-manager-plus Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Mitigation: set -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true in jvm.options.
